name: Chromatic (itch) (Corbac, Lunarks, Edinn)
description:
Submission for the Global Game Jam 2022, developed on-site at Skövde Game Arena (Sweden), with the theme Duality.

2D Platformer, in order to complete the different levels, you will need to go back and forth between the coloured world and the Black and White world.

Controls:

  • A/D: Movements left/Right
  • W/Space: Jump
  • E: World shift

Credits: 

  • Bryan Curchod (Corbac): Game & Level Designer, Programmer
  • Edin Karakurt (Edinn): Game & Level Designer, Programmer
  • Jessica Algotsson: 2D Pixel Artist
  • Johan Bergström: Music & Sound Composer
  • Selin Kaya (Lunarks): Game & Level Designer, Programmer, 2D Pixel Artist
